description: A Bite Truck is an embodiment of our motto "Simple is Sexy", allowing gourmet foodies and everyday customers alike to bond over simple and delicious gourmet California fusion food.Chef Keba earned his chops on award-winning gourmet food trucks such as Barcelona on the Go, 2010 Winner of the Best New Age Truck of the Year, and The Lime Truck, winner of the second season of The Great Food Truck Race. Chef Keba runs the successful catering company A Bite to Remember, and has also been the executive chef of the popular nightclub and concert venue The Yost Theater in Santa Ana. He has created a vast variety of superb entrees and decadent desserts, and A Bite Truck brings them to you!Pastry Chef Stina brings a little sweetness to the menu, making desserts and delights, big and small. But don't think that life is all sugar and sweets to Stina – she daydreams about savory side of life and enjoys creating fabulous dishes with an emphasis on freshness, simplicity, & locality.
name: A Bite Truck
